servinfo.title: Injection Warning Light (Gravity 1 Fault) Check
servinfo.ptxt: Injection warning light (1) serves to indicate proper functioning and to signal system failures.
Check that it turns ON for 2 seconds after ignition switch is turned ON, and it turns OFF.
After the ignition switch is turned ON, if light remains ON, go to DTC Check:F9Q .

If injection warning light flashes ON and OFF, there is some trouble in the immobilizer control system referring to On-Board Diagnostic System Description (Self-diagnosis Function):Diesel Engine Model .
